arts.ttl: “Isn’t all about” | West Ham show interest in African star
arts.sum: West Ham could make a move for an African star who hasn’t found his form while playing for one of Europe’s elites. Despite having such an immense pool of attacking players, West Ham have struggled for goals so far this season. Across their first 6 Premier League games, they’ve only managed to find the back... arts.ttl: Thomas Frank makes Bryan Mbeumo prediction after Brentford's draw with West Ham
arts.sum: Brentford head coach Thomas Frank offers a prediction over Bryan Mbeumo's future following Saturday's 1-1 draw against West Ham United.

arts.ttl: “Must be waiting” | Hammers have potential Lopetegui replacement
arts.sum: A pundit has claimed that an out of work English manager is waiting for the West Ham job. Following the announcement that David Moyes would not be offered a new contract at West Ham, fans were scrambling to work out who the next manager could be. While there were some extremely popular choices, the club... The post “Must be waiting” | Hammers have potential Lopetegui replacement appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: “We’ll talk” | Lopetegui demands West Ham fan’s patience
arts.sum: West Ham manager Julen Lopetegui said fans must wait until the end of the season before they can judge him. For well over a year, David Moyes was consistently under immense pressure to keep his job. Unfortunately, he couldn’t outrun that for so long and it was likely down to his impressive record in Europe... The post “We’ll talk” | Lopetegui demands West Ham fan’s patience appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Soucek cancels out Mbeumo's early goal to earn West Ham a point
arts.sum: Brentford and West Ham United shared the points in a keenly-contested London derby as Bryan Mbeumo ’s goal was cancelled out by Tomas Soucek in a 1-1 draw at the Gtech Community Stadium. Mbeumo volleyed home from close range after 38 seconds to give Brentford the perfect start, but the hosts could not build on their advantage and West Ham equalised early in the second half.

arts.ttl: Brentford set incredible Premier League scoring record in West Ham draw
arts.sum: Brentford set a Premier League scoring record in Saturday's 1-1 draw against West Ham United at the Gtech Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Jamie O'Hara pleads with West Ham United fan live on air after what he saw v Brentford

arts.ttl: BBC pundit tells West Ham to make Lopetegui decision after 'Disrespectful' Moyes treatment

arts.ttl: West Ham and Chelsea Want to Sign Jhon Duran in 2025
arts.sum: Aston Villa forward Jhon Duran has been linked with Premier League rivals Chelsea and West Ham.

arts.ttl: Brentford set new Premier League record in West Ham draw
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo's 37-second strike earned the Bees a place in the record books after becoming the first team to score in the first minute of three consecutive matches
